name: aMAZEin' NEON
description:
aMAZEin' NEON is a top-down friend-collecting puzzle game. Collect your NEON friends and lead them through the MAZE dungeon! It's aMAZEin'!

Game created at #TOJam 2016: Don't Stop bELEVEN by Golden Xyst Team: Tony Ilersich, Sebastian Swarney & Mikki Benaglia.

Tony Ilersich - Programmer
Sebastian Swarney - Character Artist
Mikki Benaglia - Environment Artist

Created at TOJam's annual event in 2016, TOJam11 Don't Stop bELEVEN: http://www.tojam.ca/history/2016.asp
